metadata.title: Complete Genome Sequence of the Porcine Epidemic Diarrhea Virus Strain SLO/JH-11/2015

abstract.original_text: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus (PEDV) was detected for the first time in Slovenia in January 2015. The complete genome sequence of PEDV strain SLO/JH-11/2015, obtained from a fecal sample of a fattening pig with diarrhea in September 2015, is closely related to recently detected European strains.

sentences.segment_text: Porcine epidemic diarrhea virus ( PEDV ) was detected for the first time in Slovenia in January 2015 .
The complete genome sequence of PEDV strain SLO/JH -11 / 2015 ,
obtained from a fecal sample of a fattening pig with diarrhea in September 2015 ,
is closely related to recently detected European strains .
